content: Head along the outer path past a Supporter Monk to a far building past the frozen waterfall. You can find a small gold pot at the base of the frozen falls here, but there are two Guardian Wolves overlooking it that you'll need to lure out and take care of first. Be wary you don't pull too far back down the frozen river and alert a Thunder Rhino Master on top of some rocks. After defeating them, open the pot to find a **Celestial Nonary Pill** to increase your stamina.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-Void' and the sub-subsection 'Completing the Snow Fox Questline'.
The content is as follows:
Head along the outer path past a Supporter Monk to a far building past the frozen waterfall. You can find a small gold pot at the base of the frozen falls here, but there are two Guardian Wolves overlooking it that you'll need to lure out and take care of first. Be wary you don't pull too far back down the frozen river and alert a Thunder Rhino Master on top of some rocks. After defeating them, open the pot to find a **Celestial Nonary Pill** to increase your stamina.
